mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_group ( name, summary_explain, detail_explain, item_category, address, address_detail, item_img, detail_img, location, lat, lng, seller_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{summaryExplain}, #{detailExplain}, #{itemCategory}, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{itemImg}, #{detailImg}, #{location}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{sellerId} )
